name: The Deepest Thoughts
description:
Game done for LD48 and GameJam On using both jam themes. (Deeper and Deeper & Aims of Sustainable Development)

"When there are no fish left, only memories can be caught"

Headphones  and Fullscreen Recomended.

WASD to MOVE on any direction!

LEFT MOUSE BTN  while you MOVE to break the "Cracked Ice"

RIGHT MOUSE BTN to equip your "Rod"

Use the MOUSE WHEEL up and down to control de reel.

Follow the sound if you are lost.

Experimental game about fishing memories and thoughts, where I try to explore the feeling of being lost and lonely in a post-apocalyptic version of our world. Showing what we are doing with him if we don’t do the things in a sustainable way.

Music, Game and Art done by me.
